channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Garden Furniture Deals
channel.desc: Summer is well and truly here, so head outside and discover our brilliant selection of garden deals. From outdoor furniture to decor, these will help you live al fresco.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Alfresco Living
channel.desc: Shop outdoor living accents ranging from traditional to contemporary, with our Alfresco Living show devoted to stylish seating, ambient lighting, striking plants and more.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Starts with Sosandar
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe this season with quality fashion from Sosandar. Discover everything from flattering dresses to stylish separates you'll love to wear day after day.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Jewellery
channel.desc: Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.title: Kim & Co

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ichi Danish Fashion
channel.desc: Discover Ichi's creative fashion to uplift your wardrobe! Showcasing hand-drawn prints, bold designs and exceptional craftsmanship, Ichi will transform your look in a matter of moments. Find out how.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off White Stuff
channel.desc: Up to 50% off White Stuff.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Monsoon Sale
channel.desc: Immerse yourself in Monsoon's exclusive SALE hour with up to 50% off! Discover vibrant, bohemian-inspired pieces crafted with unique artisan details.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ichi Danish Fashion
channel.desc: Discover Ichi's creative fashion to uplift your wardrobe! Showcasing hand-drawn prints, bold designs and exceptional craftsmanship, Ichi will transform your look in a matter of moments. Find out how.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasonal Must Haves
channel.desc: Tune in and update your wardrobe with the most stylish pieces for the new season. From top-quality essentials to trend-led picks, there's something here for everyone.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion

channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: FitFlop Footwear
channel.desc: Discover FitFlop, which brings you a range of bio-mechanically engineered sandals, trainers and more that support you from the ground up, so you can feel comfortable and look great all day.

channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.
